definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription
delicacy and fine taste (idiom); a wonderful treat

sentences.english: On the palate it is harmonious with a delicious sweetness and well balance acidity.
sentences.chinese: 酒體平衡，美味的甜度和酸度的和諧而統一。

sentences.english: A Single Con Panna is a delicious coffee drink that's easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 一個單一濃度潘納是一種美味的咖啡飲料，很容易使。

sentences.english: The dog soon ate up the nice cke.
sentences.chinese: 大狗很快就喫完了那塊美味的蛋糕。

sentences.english: I want some more of your dynamite stewed beef, please.
sentences.chinese: 請再給我一些你們那種美味可口的燉牛肉。

sentences.english: So if you want to taste something good, just knock at the door.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果你想要品嚐美味，就都試看吧。

sentences.english: Drink in the deliciousness of good food and good thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 酒後，在美味的好食物和良好的想法。

sentences.english: What can we do to make those cheese spread lighter and creamier , also low in fat?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣纔可以做出低脂又美味的起司抹醬呢？

sentences.english: Then you come home and cook up the legs for dinner because they are considered a delicacy.
sentences.chinese: 然後你回到家煮蛙腿當晚餐，因爲它們是非常美味的。

sentences.english: The fruit cake has tantalized the world for centuries.
sentences.chinese: 幾個世紀以來，水果蛋糕都是誘人的美味。

sentences.english: We have to go out and eat the gourmet food to enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 要享受美味大餐，就得出去喫。

sentences.english: Things like good food, and perfume.
sentences.chinese: 像，食物的美味，還有香水味。

sentences.english: These ones were very similar to Xiao Lung Bao in that there was a delicious soup inside.
sentences.chinese: 跟小籠包一樣，生煎包裏也包裹着香濃又美味的湯。

sentences.english: Fanta is a tasty orange-flavored drink that was originally designed specifically for the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 芬達最初是專門爲納粹設計的美味的桔子味飲料。

sentences.english: A brother initiate who is a skilled chef demonstrates vegetarian cooking . vegetarian stuffed cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 烹飪課上，廚師師兄示範美味素食餐點的料理方法。

sentences.english: The dainties of the great are the tears of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 富人口中的美味是窮人眼中的淚水。

sentences.english: Use Amway's cooker make dishes not only delicious but also healthy.
sentences.chinese: 安利皇后牌不鏽鋼鍋煮出來的食物不僅美味而且健康。

definition: to be fond of eating/to be gluttonous
to smell, look and taste great
way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
